## Public URLS
GET  /profile/{uid}
GET  /profile/search
GET  /welcome
GET  /sign-up
POST /sign-up
GET  /sign-up/success
GET  /error
GET  /sign-in
GET  /sign-in-failed
GET  /restore
GET  /restore/success
POST /restore
GET  /restore/{token}

## Edit account data URLS
GET  /profile/my-profile
GET  /profile/edit
POST /profile/edit
GET  /profile/edit/contacts
POST /profile/edit/contacts
GET  /profile/edit/skills
POST /profile/edit/skills
GET  /profile/edit/experience
POST /profile/edit/experience
GET  /profile/edit/certificates
POST /profile/edit/certificates
POST /profile/edit/certificates/upload
GET  /profile/edit/courses
POST /profile/edit/courses
GET  /profile/edit/education
POST /profile/edit/education
GET  /profile/edit/languages
POST /profile/edit/languages
GET  /profile/edit/hobbies
POST /profile/edit/hobbies
GET  /profile/edit/info
POST /profile/edit/info
GET  /profile/edit/password
POST /profile/edit/password

## Remove account data URLS
GET  /profile/remove
POST /profile/remove
